Our Mission

The EmpowerTVET Foundation exists to break the cycle of poverty through accessible, quality vocational education. We believe every young person, regardless of their economic background, deserves the opportunity to develop skills and build a better future.

Through scholarships, community outreach, and targeted support programs, we remove financial and geographical barriers that prevent talented youth from accessing life-changing education.

  • Provide full scholarships to deserving students
  • Expand training to underserved rural communities
  • Support women and girls in vocational education
  • Build sustainable community training centers

Scholarship Recipients

Meet some of the lives changed through foundation scholarships

Fatou Jallow

Solar Energy - Full Scholarship

"The foundation scholarship changed my life. I could never have afforded training, but now I run my own solar business."

Mariama Sowe

Fashion & Tailoring - Women's Fund

"As a single mother, this scholarship gave me hope. Today, I support my family through my tailoring business."

Lamin Ceesay

ICT Training - Rural Outreach

"Growing up in a rural village, I never imagined learning digital skills. Now I work as a web developer."
